statements: DELETE FROM campaign_performance_metrics WHERE campaign_id = 1 AND total_clicks > 100;
DELETE FROM campaign_performance_metrics WHERE total_spent < 5000 OR total_conversions = 0;
DELETE FROM ad_groups WHERE ad_group_id = 5 AND campaign_id = 2;
DELETE FROM Ads WHERE adgroup_id = 100 AND clicks > 1000;
DELETE FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND budget < 5000;
DELETE FROM campaign_performance WHERE campaign_id = 101 AND date < '2021-10-01'
